content: MW-LP CL Channel lock kit with wire rope loop ending Wire rope with end loop and adjustable channel lock for suspending strut trapeze from suitable building features such as steel beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Wire suspension system- - - ### FEATURES:Features Shorter installation time – wire suspension kits give you a much faster alternative to traditional methods with threaded rod Versatile – you can use the same wire suspension kit with a wide range of fixtures, base materials and Hilti MT strut and MVA ventilation hardware, simplifying inventory management Easier to adjust – self-locking wire lock can be adjusted tool-free, making levelling, retrofitting and long drop lengths much simpler. Pre-mounted safety nuts on the locks can then be tightened to help fix the wire rope securely in place Productivity services available – engineering and prefabrication services can be provided on complex projects SMACNA compliance – tested and verified according to the HVAC Duct Construction Standards (ANSI/SMACNA 006-2006) Applications Suspending strut trapeze from steel beams Suitable for use in dry, indoor environments only ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Wire: steel, Lock: brass Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Wire: steel, Lock: brass | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 2331655 - Wire kit MW-LP CL 2.0 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331656 - Wire kit MW-LP CL 2.0 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331657 - Wire kit MW-LP CL 2.0 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc - 2331661 - Wire kit MW-LP CL 3.0 6ft/2m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331662 - Wire kit MW-LP CL 3.0 10ft/3m - Package Size 30 pc - 2331663 - Wire kit MW-LP CL 3.0 20ft/6m - Package Size 20 pc
